description: Seth is out for a walk in the heart of downtown doing some window shopping. They get back to the studio and Seth likes what he sees but begins to feel uncomfortable as Daxton is hitting on him and Seth can feel that if he stays any long he might cheat on his BF so he leaves the studio and heads back home for the night. Alejandro doesn't even acknowledge Seth but begins to undress and convince Seth to suck his cock has he dresses down. Seth is a loyal BF and extremely horny but he knows that the passion is long gone in his relationship and begins to see Daxton's face instead of Alejandro as he pounds his deep ass. Seth is becoming more turned on now that he is fantasizing about the photographer so he begins to thrust into Alejandro for the full enjoyment of the fantasy. Seth loses grip on reality and can only see Daxton when he looks at his BF on top of him thrusting in and out of his eager ass. He can feel that his balls are about to let loose and his fantasy will be coming to a close or will it. Enjoy!
title: Broken Aperture Part 1
